name: Money is Life
description:
Made in less than 72 hours for Ludum Dare 44 for which the theme was Your life is currency. Made in Unity 2019.1.0f2.

Credits
- Game created by lilou_cormic with original music by Joshua McLean
- Contains music and sfx ©2019 Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com) Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International
- Contains graphics by Kenney (www.kenney.nl) Licensed under Creative Commons CC0 1.0 Universal

Controls
- Move tetromino: A / Left - D / Right
- Make tetromino fall: S / Down
- Rotate tetromino: W / Up / Left-click
- Rotate board: Space / Right-click
- Buy bomb tetromino: E / Middle-click

Game
- Move and rotate tetrominos and/or rotate the board
- Match 3 or more blocks. Match coin blocks to score points
- Current number of coins is at the top
- If you run out of coins you die
- If blocks go too high you die
- Score is the total number of coins you collected
- Buying bombs or hitting ! blocks will cost you coins

Known issues
- Some collision bugs when rotating
- Sometimes tetromino fall with gravity
- Score goes down but should not

Planned
- Controller support
- Have a delay before attaching
- Add more colors as you progress
- Make the speed increase more noticeable
- Tutorial

Source code available on GitHub.
